title: Pipeline Health: timezone mismatch in staleness calculation
description: pages/10_Pipeline_Health.py:140-142 staleness calculation uses datetime.fromisoformat(ts) without handling Z suffix and compares to naive datetime.now(). The time_ago() helper at line 45 already handles this correctly. Fix: copy the same pattern — ts.replace('Z', '+00:00') and datetime.now(dt.tzinfo). Currently caught by except block but shows gray instead of correct green/yellow/red.
close_reason: Fixed: .get() with defaults + timezone-aware staleness calc matching time_ago() pattern

title: CSV Export: fragile name+company matching for VanillaSoft push results
description: pages/4_CSV_Export.py:402-407 matches VanillaSoft push results back to leads using (name, company) tuples. If two leads share the same name and company, outcomes get incorrectly associated. Fix: include personId in the push payload and match on that unique identifier instead. Medium priority — real fragility in the VanillaSoft push path.
close_reason: Fixed: push result matching uses personId instead of fragile name+company tuples. 9 new tests (560 total).
